Sure, here's a modified idea based on your preferences:

Create a program where professionals in the photography and video industry can sign up to collaborate with your business on generating photography and video assets. The program will have pre-set negotiation terms, including compensation, credit, and exposure.

As part of the program, you will also host a "Collaborator Day" where potential collaborators can schedule a day to visit your business and capture photography and video assets. This will help them gain a better understanding of your brand, products, and services, and enable them to create content that aligns with your vision.

To apply for the program, potential collaborators will need to submit their information, portfolio, and a brief explanation of why they would be a good fit for the program. Once selected, you will provide them with a detailed brief outlining the scope of the project, the desired outcome, and any other relevant information.

During the collaboration, you will establish deadlines and milestones to ensure that the project stays on track and meets your objectives. You will also review and approve the final content before publishing and promoting it on your website, social media, and other relevant channels. Proper credit will be given to the collaborators to showcase their work.

Overall, this modified idea can help you create high-quality photography and video assets that align with your brand vision and values. It can also help you build relationships with other professionals in the industry and create opportunities for future collaborations.
Can you give me an outline of copy to use for the website that will promote this program

Certainly! Here's an outline for the website copy to promote your program:

1. Introduction:
* Briefly introduce your business and explain why you are launching this program.
* Highlight the importance of high-quality photography and video assets for your brand.
2. Overview of the program:
* Explain the purpose of the program and how it works.
* Emphasize the benefits of collaborating with your business, such as exposure and the opportunity to work on future projects.
3. Collaborator Day:
* Highlight the importance of the Collaborator Day and explain what it entails.
* Emphasize the benefits of visiting your business, such as gaining a better understanding of your brand and products.
4. How to apply:
* Explain the requirements for applying, such as submitting a portfolio and a brief explanation of why they would be a good fit for the program.
* Provide a link to the application form.
5. Pre-set negotiation terms:
* Provide an overview of the pre-set negotiation terms, including compensation, credit, and exposure.
* Explain how these terms will be applied and what potential collaborators can expect.
6. Timeline and deliverables:
* Provide an overview of the timeline and deliverables of the collaboration, including deadlines and milestones.
* Explain the importance of meeting these deadlines and what will happen if they are not met.
7. Final approval and credit:
* Explain the process for final approval and credit for the content created.
* Emphasize the importance of proper credit and how it benefits both your business and the collaborators.
8. Conclusion:
* Summarize the key points of the program and its benefits.
* Provide a call to action, encouraging potential collaborators to apply and highlighting the deadline for applications.

Remember to keep the tone of the copy engaging and informative, and use visual elements such as images and videos to showcase your brand and the work of previous collaborators.
Could you give me an example

Sure, here's an example of the website copy:

Welcome to [Your Business Name], where we believe in the power of high-quality photography and video assets to tell our brand story. We're excited to launch our new Collaborator Program, where we're inviting talented professionals in the photography and video industry to collaborate with us on creating stunning visual content.

Here's how it works: first, potential collaborators will need to submit their portfolio and a brief explanation of why they would be a good fit for the program. Once selected, they'll be invited to join us for our Collaborator Day, where they'll have the opportunity to visit our business and get a better understanding of our brand and products.

During the collaboration, we'll provide you with a detailed brief outlining the scope of the project, the desired outcome, and any other relevant information. We'll also have pre-set negotiation terms, including compensation, credit, and exposure, so you know exactly what to expect.

We'll work together to establish deadlines and milestones to ensure that the project stays on track and meets our objectives. We'll review and approve the final content before publishing and promoting it on our website, social media, and other relevant channels. Proper credit will be given to you to showcase your work.

At [Your Business Name], we believe that collaboration is key to creating exceptional work. By joining our Collaborator Program, you'll have the opportunity to work with us on future projects, gain exposure, and showcase your skills to a wider audience.

Interested in joining our program? Apply now by submitting your portfolio and a brief explanation of why you'd be a great fit. The deadline for applications is [insert deadline]. We can't wait to see your work!
